skills.name: Ultra Slash - Haze
skills.description: Attacks unleash an Ultra Slash against enemies to the front, dealing 80% ATK of Physical DMG. 15% chance of unleashing Enhanced Ultra Slash, dealing 160% ATK of Physical DMG. Enhanced Ultra Slash has a 0.8s CD.

skills.name: Ultra Slash - Break
skills.description: [SP: 20][CD: 25s] Character gains 25.0% Physical DMG. All Ultra Slashes are transformed into Enhanced Ultra Slashes for 8s.
